name: @zakstam/codex-runtime
description: Integrate with one prompt: install this package, open `README.md` then follow mapped docs (`docs/CANONICAL_INTEGRATION.md`, `docs/API_REFERENCE.md`) and validate with `npx convex dev --once`, `pnpm run dev:convex:once`, `pnpm run typecheck`.

onboarding.prompt:
Integrate `@zakstam/codex-runtime` in this project using only this package's docs.

Use this file (`README.md`) first, then follow only the mapped docs for the task:

- Canonical integration: `docs/CANONICAL_INTEGRATION.md`
- API lookup: `docs/API_REFERENCE.md`
- Optional runbook/checks: `docs/EXAMPLE_APPS_RUNBOOK.md`

Keep changes minimal and stay in runtime-owned mode.
Validate with:

- `npx convex dev --once`
- `pnpm run dev:convex:once` (or app equivalent)
- `pnpm run check:host-shim`
- `pnpm run typecheck`
- `pnpm --filter @zakstam/codex-runtime run doctor:integration`

If a prerequisite is missing for an app, ask for package-specific assumptions before continuing.

scripts.schema:verify: pnpm run typecheck && pnpm run test && pnpm run check:unsafe-types && pnpm run check:fallback-policy
scripts.prepack: pnpm run clean && pnpm run build
scripts.coverage: pnpm run build && NODE_V8_COVERAGE=coverage node --test --experimental-test-coverage test/*.test.mjs
scripts.ci: pnpm run typecheck && pnpm run check:component-function-validators && pnpm run check:unsafe-types && pnpm run check:error-discipline && pnpm run check:host-boundaries && pnpm run check:fallback-policy && pnpm run test && pnpm run check:mount-imports && pnpm run check:docs:single-path && pnpm run check:api-reference && pnpm run check:canonical-symbols && pnpm run doctor:integration
